overview: .When a happy-go-lucky, but very naive, Gilbert embarks on his daily adventures, he comes across a variety of interesting encounters, opportunities, obstacles, and laughable moments alongside friends, family, and some adversaries
tagline: “Gilbert is a very likeable but a very impulsive guy who doesn't take life too seriously, fibs, and can be a bit sarcastic. He pretty much messes up every situation he gets himself into.”
title: The Gilbert Diaries
